message.name: Message
message.default: This is a default dummy message.

onlyMods.name: Only Mods
onlyMods.description: Allow only moderators to use the command.

onlySubs.description: Allow only subscribers to use the command.

announceLevels.description: Announce level ups in the chat.

announceLimit.name: Announcing Limit
